answers.answer: My friend had it, she worked up until the day she gave birth.. it caused her to swell that's what it does & makes your blood pressure high
Yes  i did they kept me at the hospital for  a week then i had to have my son early because it was so bad

It depends, your doctor will monitor you and if things seem to be going well you can work all the way up until delivery and deliver on time, but if things seem to worsen then your doctor may suggest bed rest until you deliver because preeclampsia is known to make women deliver early

question: Has anyone had or have preeclampsia ?What did they do to you once they found out? Did you need to stop working?  Were you put on bedrest? Did your diet change?
title: preeclampsia
